articles.title: Microsoft answered Congress' questions on security. Now the White House needs to act - The Register
articles.description: Business as usual needs a real change
articles.content: Feature Microsoft president Brad Smith struck a conciliatory tone regarding his IT giant's repeated computer security failings during a congressional hearing on Thursday while also claiming the Windo… [+8855 chars]

articles.author: Robert Harvey
articles.title: Oil prices on track for weekly gain on solid demand outlook - Reuters
articles.description: Brent oil futures prices were steady on Friday and on course for their best week in more than four months after solid projections for crude oil and fuel demand.
